name: NFL Rivals - Football Game
description:
Are you ready to be the General Manager of your own NFL football team? Show off your pro sports manager skills in NFL Rivals, an officially licensed professional mobile football game with digital player cards.

Get ahead of the pack and be a part of one of the NFL’s biggest moves! Join the game now during Offseason to help shape the future of one of the hottest officially licensed NFL and NFLPA mobile games, and enjoy special 2023 NFL Draft Player Packs and themed in-game events. Unlock your favorite football pros, draft your star players, set your lineups, and gear up in your Squads. It’s time to get game-day ready – you’re about to be making major moves when NFL Rivals officially kicks off later this year!

Collect digital player cards and build your dream team of NFL superstars to compete against other rivals, climb the leaderboards, and take your team all the way to the Super Bowl. Feel the rush of nonstop action and excitement as you dive into this fast-paced arcade-style game that will test the limits of your strategy and skill.

Play as the coach, general manager, and owner all in one. Set up your lineup, call the plays, run the offense, and unlock more and more player cards as you play. Draft players and upgrade your roster in this fun and wild twist on NFL mobile games.

Arcade-style football meets intense rivalries in the biggest game in football history! Collect, upgrade, and trade digital player cards to build your team of pro-NFL players and dominate the competition. Each game is action-packed with exhilarating arcade-style football gameplay.

Bring the action online and test your skills and your team against other GMs to earn in-game rewards. Compete in exciting PVP tournaments or join a tight-knit Squad and climb the leaderboards. Build your personal collection of exclusive digital player cards to show off your team pride!


KEY FEATURES:

Become a General Manager!
- Become a top football general manager and guide your dream team of NFL players to the endzone.
- Choose from a variety of NFL teams and tackle fierce rivalries in fast-paced card-collecting action.
- Collect digital player cards of your favorite pro football players in an adrenaline-filled card game
- Draft and improve your lineup as you collect NFL cards and assemble your team

Enjoy Arcade-Style Gameplay!
- Claim victory over your rivals through arcade-style football gameplay full of electrifying action and nonstop fun.
- Experience incredible catches, fun visual effects, hilarious touchdown celebrations, and big moments!

Build Your Dream Team!
- Unlock football superstars as you play, collect & upgrade digital collectibles of your favorite players, and take your dream team to the Super Bowl.
- Maximize your dream team’s potential by upgrading the players you’ve earned.
- Quarterback, linebacker, wide receiver, running back. Build your All-Pro NFL lineup in each position to take on any rival!

Multiplayer Action!
- Take your dream team and build an NFL dynasty by playing real NFL team rosters.
- Play seasons, make the playoffs, and win the Super Bowl before running it back the next season.
- Enter into weekly events to compete online against other players and their dream teams in asynchronous mode.
- Own a squad and team up with other GMs to climb to the top of the leaderboards and earn additional in-game rewards.

Download NFL Rivals for unmatched football action in an all-new arcade-style sports game. Take to the field and dominate the competition today!
